subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic gave Serbia an insurmountable 3-1 lead over the United States with a win over Sam Querrey in a Davis Cup quarterfinal in Boise, Idaho.
snippet: Novak Djokovic gave Serbia an insurmountable 3-1 lead over the United States with a win over Sam Querrey in a Davis Cup quarterfinal in Boise, Idaho.
